meanings.definition: In a manner involving two axes.
meanings.sent1: The machine stretched the plastic biaxially to improve its strength.
meanings.sent2: The material was stretched biaxially to ensure even distribution of tension.
meanings.sent3: The robot danced biaxially, moving its arms and legs in perfect sync.
meanings.sent4: The gymnast's body moved biaxially through the air, twisting and turning effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The car's wheels spun biaxially, gripping the road with precision.

meanings.sent1: The biaxially oriented film had superior strength and durability.
meanings.sent2: The biaxially aligned crystals exhibited unique optical properties.
meanings.sent3: The biaxially mounted camera captured stunning panoramic views.
meanings.sent4: The biaxially symmetric design of the building was both functional and aesthetically pleasing.
meanings.sent5: The biaxially reinforced structure withstood the powerful winds without any damage.
